title: Tenshou Kizoku No Bannou Kaitaku Kara~ "kakudai & Shukushou" Sukiru O Tsukatte Itara Saikyou Ryouchi Ni Narimashita～
alternative_title: 転生貴族の万能開拓～【拡大＆縮小】スキルを使っていたら最強領地になりました～
status: 転生貴族の万能開拓～【拡大＆縮小】スキルを使っていたら最強領地になりました～
description:
Description :
        A former corporate slave who died from overwork is reincarnated as Noct, the second son of the Bigsmall family's minor lordship. He arrives in a different world with a firm determination to "never work again!" However, the territory is constantly impoverished due to monsters attacking from the great forest. Upon coming of age, he receives a seemingly useless skill: "Enlarge & Shrink." To make matters worse, his father and brother disappear due to a monster attack, leaving only two people in the territory. Noct, with his innate NEET tendencies, becomes the lord to create a world where he doesn't have to work!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1.2: Since I Really Don’T Want To Die From Overwork
Vol.1 Chapter 1.1: Since I Really Don’T Want To Die From Overwork
